name: Wandering Shadow
text:
Battle a normal Shadow, and receive Charms and Railway Coins if you defeat it.
You also have a low chance to find a Lost Item.

name: Agitated Shadow
text:
Battle a tough Shadow, with a high chance of receiving Purple Charms and Railway Coins if you defeat it.
There is also a high chance of finding a Lost Item.
text0:

name: Savage Shadow
text:
Battle an extremely powerful Shadow, and receive a guaranteed Orange Charm or Lost Item along with Railway Coins if you defeat it.
Defeating the Shadow will also open the next route for you to proceed.

name: Stubborn Shadow
text:
Battle a Boss Shadow at the Terminal Station.
Defeat it to clear the Control Center.

text:

name: Lost Shadow: Blessing
text:
Listen to what the Shadows have to say and help them make choices, and you may receive Lost Items or Railway Coins.
There's a higher chance of something good happening.
